page.title: 09HARESFIELD C.OF E. SCHOOL
page.content: This school which dates from 1873, has a staff of Headmistress (Mrs Hodgson), 2 full-time & 1 part-time assistant teachers and a welfare assistant. The children are admitted at the age of 4+ to the reception class and eventually leave for secondary school at the age of 11+. The school has a temporary building to accomodate the younger children. It has a large playing field adjacent to the main building though this is shared with the village. There is a lady caretaker who lives nearby. The parents play an active part in school activities and are at the moment involved in a school production of a play written by one of the parents. The play is caleed 'Small World".
